article_title: Reports Of The Death Of Employer Sponsored Health Insurance Are Greatly Exaggerated

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: Mark Twain famously remarked “The reports of my death are greatly exaggerated”. The same can be said of the death of employer sponsored health insurance (“ESHI”). It will be with us for many years because it creates strong value for many employers and employees.
